# Servant Horde (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]], [[5th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Invisible, mindless, shapeless servants

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 128

*As you complete this spell, you sense a number of invisible entities form around you.* 

This spell creates a number of *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servants]]* equal to 1 per level (maximum +15).

*Material Component:* A small stick to which many lengths of knotted thread are attached.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* The Level is reduced to Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 and the number of *unseen servants* created is changed from 2d6+1 per level to 1 per level for game balance with the *[[Unseen Entourage (Spell)|unseen entourage]]* spell. Added Wu jen 5 to Level per Complete Arcane.
